loginMinlengthErrorTip: Login should be at least two characters long
passwordPatternErrorTip: Please check your password for typos
passwordRequirements: <x id="START_PARAGRAPH" ctype="x-p" equiv-text="<p>"/>Please provide login (more than two characters), name and a strong password.<x id="CLOSE_PARAGRAPH" ctype="x-p" equiv-text="</p>"/><x id="START_PARAGRAPH" ctype="x-p" equiv-text="<p>"/>For your safety password should be:<x id="CLOSE_PARAGRAPH" ctype="x-p" equiv-text="</p>"/><x id="START_UNORDERED_LIST" ctype="x-ul" equiv-text="<ul>"/><x id="START_LIST_ITEM" ctype="x-li" equiv-text="<li>"/>at least 8 characters<x id="CLOSE_LIST_ITEM" ctype="x-li" equiv-text="</li>"/><x id="START_LIST_ITEM" ctype="x-li" equiv-text="<li>"/>both uppercase and lowercase letters<x id="CLOSE_LIST_ITEM" ctype="x-li" equiv-text="</li>"/><x id="START_LIST_ITEM" ctype="x-li" equiv-text="<li>"/>both letters and numbers<x id="CLOSE_LIST_ITEM" ctype="x-li" equiv-text="</li>"/><x id="START_LIST_ITEM" ctype="x-li" equiv-text="<li>"/>contain at least one special character, e.g., ! @ # ? ]<x id="CLOSE_LIST_ITEM" ctype="x-li" equiv-text="</li>"/><x id="CLOSE_UNORDERED_LIST" ctype="x-ul" equiv-text="</ul>"/>
userAlreadyExistsErrorTip: This user login already exists, please provide a new one
CreateBoardImageTooltip: What do you want to see on board cover
AccessDeniedModalContent: Sorry, but you're not a participant of this board. Please contact the owner to get access!
confirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ itemToDelete }}"/>?
TaskDescriptionMaxlengthErrorTip: Description should be no more than 255 characters long
